lines.text:
[Viewing singer Vic Damone on television with Diane Carol]
How the hell did an Italian get a fine-ass black woman like that? Shit, he can't sing. Only reason she marry him is 'cause he rich. 'Takin' all our sisters.
[Franklin Hatchett is wearing James Russell's favorite suit]
You fuck up the suit, we've got a problem.
Fuck the suit, we've already got a problem!
You know guns don't kill people, stupid motherfuckers with guns kill people!
Long Beach Airport. 3 AM. Hangar Number seven. Keep the diamonds in a plastic bag. They will be weighed.
Kiss my ass, we meet when I say we meet, you French motherfucker.
[Hangs up phone]
He'll call back.
[Phone rings]
Alright, motherfucker, here's the deal...
Watch your mouth!
Mama! Mama! I didn't know it was you!

[Has just fallen into the river]
Cold! It's colder than a motherfucker!
Don't say anything about my fiance's weight. She's sensitive.
Man you must have one of them fat assed, Taco Bell, McDonalds eatin' big booty-assed girls.
You're phat.
Excuse me?
You're phat. P-H-A-T. Pretty Hot And Tempting.
This tub wasn't clean you dirty assed white boy!
No wedding!
We got 300 people coming here.
Good, they come here, they eat, they drink, they sing, they go the fuck home! Sorry!
I want some answers!
Hey man, me and Guy just down here, checkin' out some fly rides, and mackin' some hos and chillin'.
Imagine that. It's like a G-Dog on a fly tip. Flossin' wit da posse. Cuttin' in da crib. WHAT THE FUCK DOES THAT MEAN?
Man, I don't wanna have to beat yo ass, but I will *beat* *yo* *ass*!
If you try anything fucked up or funny, I swear to God I will kill you myself.
Just like you did back on the dock, huh? (Mocking laugh) I will beat your ass.
You ain't beatin' shit, homes.
You better not be over at no girl's house.
Hell no I ain't at no goddamn girl's house. I'm wanted for muder. I ain't got time to get no pussy.
What?
I ain't fucking nobody but you.
Whatever man, look I'll hook up the hair, but I ain't touching the earring 'cause I'm still a player!
Fine! I gotta make a phone call.
[Mutters]
And I don't think there's any hot water left.
What? WHAT? Punk-ass white boy. This tub better be clean.
Why you always gotta be killing someone, why dont you try loving someone?

I will slap you man! I will slap the hell outta you. You don't know who you messin' with. I don't even know when I'm gonna slap somebody. My reflexes just slap people. I'm like damn why did I do that? I don't know when I be slapping people. I don't know when I'm gonna slap somebody. You keep messing with me. I'm dangerous! I'm scared of myself. They call me snap and pop cuz I will snap and I will pop yo ass in the mouth! Don't mess with me man. You better watch your back. Watch your goddamn back! Even in the shower! Even on picnics! You better watch your goddamn back. Make a right.
Quite an operation you've got, tell me what is going on here?
I'm a business man, Man, what the fuck you think is going on...?
Cut! Cut. You can't use that kind of language on TV.
What language? What you talkin' 'bout?
Fuck.
Fuck what?
You cannot say Fuck on television!
Man, fuck that man, you're the one who came down here so don't tell me how to talk. Hurry this up I got shit to do.
What you got?
Dodgers tickets, Lakers tickets and Phantom of the Opera tickets.
Phantom of the Opera?
Yeah it's theater, man, you ever been to the theater?
Man what the hell wrong with you, nobody gonna give a damn about no Phantom of the Opera!
Franklin, there's money in culture.
Let me tell you something, Roland, black people don't wanna see that shit. Now I told you to get me some good shit like Luther Vandross tickets or something.
Luther Vandross ain't culture.
Fuck culture, give me some good shit, man, people are complaining about these fucked up tickets. You're making me look bad, man.
Good evening. James Russell, Channel 12 news, I'm doing a report on local night clubs in the area, I'd like to ask you a few questions.
Aw, you're the invstigative reporter.
Why yes I am.
Get the fuck out of here!
Who gives a rat's ass about some two bit hustler?
The people getting ripped off by this two bit hustler give a rat's ass.
Please do something about that hair of yours.
My 'do is tight.
Well every cop in the city is looking for that tight 'do.
I need this for sweeps week!
Sweeps week? Man fuck sweeps week, my life's on the line and you're talking about a damn broom!
Hey, man... Me and Guy just down here checkin' out some fly rides, mackin' some hoes, and chillin'...
Imagine that... It's like a G-Dogg on a fly tip flossin' with the posse, cuttin' in the crib... WHAT THE FUCK DOES THAT MEAN?
That was some hard hitting stuff. John Tesh School of Journalism.
James had a lot of women. Actually, he had all the women.
All the women, all the guys, I fucked 'em all!
What am I supposed to tell them?
You tell'em that our Grace is about to be married to some no-good, limp-dick bastard.
He is NOT limp-dick, Daddy.
I DON'T WANNA HEAR THAT!
So this James is a murderer, is that it?
No, Daddy, James is innocent.
And this other guy, is he Vic Damone's son or isn't he?
I don't know.
So what are you telling me? He's 100% mouli?
Who cares?
I had Ma make him a mozzarella omelet! That lying son of a bitch bastard.

[Overhearing Raymond and Dubray talking]
Fifteen million? Fifteen million dollars? Oh, you gotta cut a brother in on that. Hey, we split it three ways. Seven for me,
[to Dubray]
Seven for you,
[to Raymond]
And you, you get whatever's left over 'cause you been tripping ever since I met you.
If I give you the gun, and he shoot me I'm gonna kick yo ass!

[taking over from James in repeatedly kicking a downed Vincent]
We've GOT to GO, man! We've GOT to GO! We've GOT to GO!

[looking down at Vincent while still kicking him]
Don't you EVER call me your DAMN HOMEY, FRENCHY!

[to James still standing in front of him]
What part of "You're fired" you don't understand?
[someone on the phone starts speaking]
I'm not talking to you, asshole. What?
MAN, GET THE HELL OF ME, MAN! AND WHERE'S YO SHIRT AT?
Hey hey, Barclay, it's James. How you doing? Listen to me, I've got Franklin Hatchett.
Russell, don't play games with me. Words like that give me a stiffy and at my age I can not afford to waste them.
Cut! Fucking cut!
